snippet: In a speech in Berlin on Wednesday, President Obama will resume a drive toward disarmament that had been largely shunted aside.
abstract: Pres Obama plans to use speech in Berlin to outline further reductions in American nuclear arsenal if Russia agrees to pare back its weapons at same time; proposal, which would resume abandoned drive toward disarmament, faces obstacles from both Russia and Senate Republicans.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: In a speech in Berlin on Wednesday, President Obama will resume a drive toward disarmament that had been largely shunted aside.

headline.main: Obama Has Plans to Cut U.S. Nuclear Arsenal, if Russia Reciprocates
headline.print_headline: Obama Has Plans to Cut U.S. Nuclear Arsenal, if Russia Reciprocates

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
